New.name: Sport Basketball
New.overview: The Sport Basketball Fit apparel is crafted for basketball players who need performance and affordability. Priced at $49, this sportswear offers a snug, flexible fit and moisture-wicking technology to keep athletes comfortable during games or practices. Its sleek design ensures you look and feel your best on the court.

New.name: Nike
New.overview: The Nike Shoe is a versatile, everyday sneaker that balances style and functionality. With a sleek black-and-white design, it’s perfect for casual wear or light athletic activities. The shoe offers reliable cushioning and a sturdy outsole, ensuring comfort and durability for daily use. It’s an affordable option for those seeking classic Nike quality.

New.name: Nike Hoodie
New.overview: The Nike Custom Hoodie is a premium, personalized piece of apparel designed for those who want to stand out. Priced at $500, this hoodie combines luxurious materials with customizable design elements, offering a unique blend of streetwear style and high-end fashion. Perfect for casual outings or making a bold statement, it’s a must-have for Nike enthusiasts.

New.name: Sport Basketball
New.overview: Identical to ID 5, this Sport Basketball Black Wear is a budget-friendly option for basketball players. Its moisture-wicking fabric and ergonomic design ensure maximum comfort and mobility on the court. The black aesthetic exudes confidence, making it a popular choice for athletes who want performance without breaking the bank.

New.name: Basketball
New.overview: This Basketball Wear from Nike is engineered for high-performance athletes. Priced at $173, it features advanced fabric technology for enhanced breathability and flexibility, allowing players to move freely during fast-paced games. The design emphasizes durability and comfort, making it ideal for both practice sessions and competitive matches.
